text: Sara Gideon (born December 4, 1971) is an American politician. She has been the Speaker of the Maine House of Representatives since 2016. She is a member of the Democratic Party. She was an unsuccessful candidate in the 2020 U.S. Senate election against Republican incumbent Susan Collins. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *Twitter account Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Rhode Island Category:Politicians from Maine Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Sara Gideon
